generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, typical of a roadway for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by trees and a curb, designed for pedestrian use.
- building: A large modern building with glass walls and a structured facade is prominently visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along both sides of the road, particularly on the left side and interspersed along the right side.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the far right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign with a white 'P' is visible on the right side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic sign and possibly streetlights or other fixtures along the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast and gray.
- car: A car is visible in the distance on the road, appearing as a small, dark shape ahead of the vehicle from which the photo is taken.
